mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart (cart_id, product_id, sku_id, user_id, cart_num, cart_time, product_price) values (#{cartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cartNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update shopping_cart set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cart_num = #{cartNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cart_time = #{cartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_price = #{productPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cart_id = #{cartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cart_id, product_id, sku_id, user_id, cart_num, cart_time, product_price from shopping_cart
